scripts.git-dist: git add --all && git commit -m "[UP] : deploy dist"
scripts.git-bump: git add package.json && git commit -m "[BUMP] : version"
scripts.deploy-patch: npm run build && npm run git-dist && npm version patch && npm run git-bump && git push
scripts.deploy-minor: npm run build && npm run git-dist && npm version minor && npm run git-bump && git push
scripts.deploy-major: npm run build && npm run git-dist && npm version major && npm run git-bump && git push
